Don't reply with non-sense that isn't sourced. Wading through all of the wrong answers on this site is bad enough. In regards to the question, from CompTIA's Official Student Guide Version 2:
"functional managers
Individuals who are part of management in the administrative or functional side, such as human resources, finances, accounting, or even procurement of the business in the
organization. They sometimes act as subject matter experts or may provide services needed for the project."

No where in CompTIA's official material does it list a Functional Manager as a Stakeholder. This question is obviously leaning towards communication issues, therefore C & E are the correct answers (Communications Plan and Status Reports). By updating the Communications Plan and including Status Reports, the Functional will get and have all of the information he was previously missing.
